thread.title: Trump praises military sales in talks with Saudi crown prince

title: Trump praises military sales in talks with Saudi crown prince
text:
Trump praises military sales in talks with Saudi crown prince 3:16pm EDT - 01:54 
In Oval Office talks, Trump and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman discussed Saudi investments with the United States as well as how to deal with Iran. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
In Oval Office talks, Trump and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman discussed Saudi investments with the United States as well as how to deal with Iran. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IEhFcj
